sentences.cn: 马戏团里踩高跷的演员

sentences.en: A performer in evening dress plays classical selections on the violin.
sentences.cn: 一名身穿晚礼服的表演者用小提琴演奏了几段古典音乐。

sentences.en: He is a good performer on the cricket field.
He is a world class performer.
sentences.cn: 他是位世界级的表演者。

sentences.en: He was a better songwriter than performer.
sentences.cn: 他更擅长写歌，而不是演唱。

sentences.en: He was supposed to be a serious performer, but the crowd laughed him off the stage.
sentences.cn: 他被认为是严肃的演员, 但观众却把他哄下了台.

sentences.en: His recitals have earned him recognition as a talented performer.
sentences.cn: 他的演奏会使他赢得了天才演奏家的赞誉.

sentences.en: She is compelling, spectral, fascinating, an unforgettably unique performer.
sentences.cn: 她极具吸引力，清幽如鬼魅，令人着迷，令人难忘，是个独具特色的演员。
她是个技艺非凡的表演者。

sentences.en: She was no mean performer on a variety of other instruments.
sentences.cn: 许多别的乐器她也演奏得相当出色。
她是富有经验的音乐会演奏家.

sentences.en: The actor was considered as a mettlesome dramatic performer.
sentences.cn: 这个演员被认为是个勇敢的戏剧演员。

sentences.en: The musical theater company is about to launch a new performer on the musical world.
sentences.cn: 这家音乐公司即将向音乐界推出一位新人.

sentences.en: The performer received only pitying looks from his audience.
sentences.cn: 从观众的表情看,那表演者得到的只是同情和怜悯.

sentences.en: The president was a polished television performer.
sentences.cn: 总统非常善于在电视上表现自己.

sentences.en: The young performer boasted himself to be an all - rounder .
sentences.cn: 这个青年演员自称是个 多面手.

trans.tran_cn: 执行者，演奏者，演员，歌手，完成者
trans.tran_en: an actor, musician etc who performs to entertain people
